posts.post_content:
Three distinct groupings in this one post... All prices are delivered:

[STRIKE]Fielder Jones Portrait (trimmed top and bottom); beautiful card that must have been really over-sized; light corner crease bottom right.  Big Factory Number on bottom - $55[/STRIKE]

A group of eight Piedmont T206s (PM me for larger scans) ; take all eight for $130:
[STRIKE]John Anderson - $18 - rounded corners; light bottom right corner crease
[/STRIKE][STRIKE]Harry Arndt - $20 - nice colors/corners; "scrap book" lines on back[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Paul Davidson - $13 - WYSISYG[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Bill Graham - $20 - nice card; light stain on back; very light vertical wrinkle[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Izzy Hoffman - $14 - great color; top left corner crease; "scrap book" paper loss[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Harry McIntyre (Brooklyn) - $22 - light vertical crease under glove
Jimmy Phelan - $17 - top left corner crease; "scrap book" lines
Hunky Shaw - $20 - great color/centering; top left corner crease; diagonal crease right side through P in jersey
[/STRIKE]


Thanks!  See scans below.
